text: The grub of the tigerfly is not a tigerfly until it changes. So humans change.' 'I cannot know what he says,' Haris said stubbornly, throwing himself down. But Lily-yo and Flor were listening.
handwritten_text: The grub of the tigerfly is not a tigerfly until it changes. So humans change.' 'I cannot know what he says,' Haris said stubbornly, throwing himself down. But Lily-yo and Flor were listening.
